actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Concurrent resolution to authorize the printing of a revised edition of, "The Constitution of the United States of America," as a House Document.

summary.text: Directs the printing as a House document of a revised edition of "The Constitution of the United States of America", revised under the direction of the Committee on House Administration.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to authorize the printing of a revised edition of, "The Constitution of the United States of America," as a House Document.
